spirit:component.spirit:name: apbSubSystem
spirit:component.spirit:description: The apbSubSystem contains the APB bus master, bus controller and most of the APB peripherals, the interrupt controller, timers, and two UARTS.

FabProcess.process: TSMC 0.13um BCD Cu 1P6M 1.5V/5V/36V with ESD, HiR, 3 Implants, MIM, UTM, OTP 8in - 41L >5000w/month
